name: NOHEAD: No One Has Escaped the Alienating Den
name_original: NOHEAD: No One Has Escaped the Alienating Den
description:
NOHEAD: No One Has Escaped the Alienating Den

Explore a cave full of dangerous hazards and puzzles that require you to drop your head in order to let go of your fears, allowing you to move with more ease.
But don't forget to pick it up, as it will become a threat to your journey if you abandon it on the cold ground of the cavern.

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2022, with the theme "Duality"

Credits
  • Game Design : Luc CORNU, Lucas DRUCKES & Gaëtan PIOU
  • Programming : Luc CORNU, Lucas DRUCKES
  • Art : Gaëtan PIOU
  • Music : Philippe-Albert LEBLANC
